text: Approval for:  a) Selute(R) Picotip(TM) Steroid Eluting, Endocardial Pacing Lead Model 4030, 4031, 4032, 4033, 4034, and 4035 which are indicated for chronic pacing and asensing of the ventricle when used with a compatible pulse generator, and b) the use of the Cosmed of Illinois facility as an alternate sterilization site.
